document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2021-02
document.heading: AN URGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE BY ADDING CHAPTER 5.70, RELATING TO HAZARD PAY FOR GROCERY WORKERS IN AMERICAN CANYON TO TAKE EFFECT TEN DAYS FROM ADOPTION
